'''Caring''' is a joke [[effect]] from [[Java Edition 15w14a]] which replaces the data value of both [[Slowness]] and [[Poison]] effects.

== Effect ==
Caring causes [[mob]]s to change their AI to move toward the nearest mob as if it were to attack it.

The effect can be removed by drinking [[milk]].
